did.unittitle: Norah Chase: Professional Staff Congress/City University of New York Papers

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: peter.filardo@nyu.edu

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Norah Chase, an associate professor of English at Kingsborough Community College in Brooklyn, N.Y., and a long-time activist in the Professional Staff Congress (PSC), the labor union representing college teachers in the City University of New York system, donated these materials. This collection contains copies of Unity News, pamphlets, flyers, correspondence, and meeting minutes related to the 2000 election of PSC officers and representatives.
